Basketball- Allen Iverson will rehabilitate his right calf in the U.S. after being examined by a surgeon. The former NBA MVP will not require surgery but his calf has a calcium deposit and secondary bleeding. It's tricky because of the location, Andrews said as quoted by AP. The ruling party headquarters building next door to the museum was still in flames and billowing black smoke into the sky on Saturday, a day after protesters torched it during mass anti-government demonstrations. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, antiquities boss Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks try to extinguish the blaze in the NDP headquarters. want the Bill Clinton and Congress to work together on the big issues, not least the economy. Larry Sabato said the Republican takeover of the House of Representatives gives the Bill Clinton a new political lease on life. Once the Tea Party members of the House start having a full airing of their views, Barack Obama will appear more moderate. He's going to be nicely positioned between the old Barack Obama and the new Republican House. I've said for more than a year that if the Democrats hold both the House and the Senate Barack Obama might be a one-term Bill Clinton . Now he has someone to blame and someone to make him to look better. Colin Powell , former secretary of state in the Bush administration who endorsed Barack Obama in the 2008 election, said the Bill Clinton was well positioned politically. of inner peace," said Erika, who adopted one of the Michael Vick dogs, Oliver, and didn't want her last name used because she doesn't want herself or Oliver to be targeted for harassment. But I thought, no, no, no, don't get angry. Don't let a person like that ruin you. If I can't control what happens to him, I can control what happens to me and I can channel this anger into a big bunch of love. And so, she met Oliver, the dog they said would never kiss a human, but who now sleeps with his pet parent and showers her with kisses every morning when she wakes up.
